hero.title: One QR, your dog's entire life in one scan.
hero.subtitle: Because their safety shouldn't be left behind.
hero.paragraph: Imagine a world where you never have to worry about updating your dogâ€™s tag. With our app and smart collar, all your best friend's information is just a scan away.
card.qr.desc: The best tags on the market
card.love.desc: your pets as much as you

2019.title: The Beginning
2019.desc: In 2019, we started with just an idea: helping lost pets find their way home faster.

2022.title: The App
2022.desc: In 2022, we launched our mobile app and started connecting QR tags with smart profiles.

2024.title: Global Reach
2024.desc: By 2024, thousands of pets across the world were wearing our tags.

2025.title: The Future
2025.desc: We're building new features with AI to detect and alert owners when pets are found.
